title: Swayman leads the Bruins past the Red Wings 3-2 in a shootout
description: Jeremy Swayman stopped all three shots he faced in the shootout, and the Boston Bruins beat the Detroit Red Wings 3-2. Morgan Geekie scored two goals for Boston in regulation.

title: Kalshi Is Subject to Nevada Gaming Regulation, Judge Rules
description: A federal judge in Las Vegas dealt a blow to Kalshi Inc.’s sports-betting business in Nevada by allowing state gaming regulators to take enforcement actions against the predictions-market startup.

title: Elon Musk once called DOGE ‘the chainsaw for bureaucracy,’ but it has quietly ceased to exist well ahead of schedule, report says
description: "But, the principles of DOGE remain alive and well: de-regulation; eliminating fraud, waste and abuse; re-shaping the federal workforce; making efficiency a first-class citizen; etc."

title: Bybit Advances Regulatory Dialogue at Argentina’s Regulation Day 2025, Spotlighting Crypto’s Role in Financial Inclusion
Banks Get Extra $2.6 Trillion From Deregulation, Jefferies Says
description: Looser regulation for US banks is expected to unlock some $2.6 trillion in lending capacity for large financial institutions, according to Jefferies analysts, cementing the richer valuation of American lenders over rivals in Europe.
